content: MQZ-F Bored plate (HDG) Hot-dip galvanized (HDG) bored plate for trapeze assembly and anchoring (imperial) ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Standard fixings for support systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Suitable for MQ strut channels and brackets Easy to install Applications Attaching strut channels and brackets to walls, ceilings or floors Wing nut or spring nut applications with channels or brackets Anchor fastening of installation channels Recommended for use in moderately corrosive outdoor and indoor environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: S235JR - DIN EN 10025 Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Environmental conditions: Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) Technical Data | Material composition | S235JR - DIN EN 10025 | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 304200 - Base plate MQZ-F 3/8-F HDG - Package Size 20 pc - 304201 - Base plate MQZ-F 1/2-F HDG - Package Size 20 pc
